title: Perfect pâtisserie – top tips and recipes inspired by the Great British Bake Off
text:
Last night’s episode of the Great British Bake Off, marked the semi-final of the competition and featured the trickiest challenges yet during ‘Pâtisserie Week’. The four remaining bakers were tasked with a domed tart signature, a fiddly Gâteau Saint Honoré technical and a showstopper construction made from towering sugar glass.

While we aren’t expecting home bakers to immediately embark on intricate sugar creations, learning to make dainty pâtisserie is within your grasp, with the help of some handy tips and recipes. “It would be easy to say, 'Leave it to the professionals.' But making French pâtisserie gives you the greatest 'I can't believe I did that myself' thrill. Don't think for a moment...
description: Last night’s episode of the Great British Bake Off, marked the semi-final of the competition and featured the trickiest challenges yet during ‘Pâtisserie Week’.
